Uses of Class
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.base.Marquee

  • Packages that use Marquee 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.base
    This is the main package for vlcj media player applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.

    • Uses of Marquee in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.base

      Marquee Marquee.colour​(int rgb)
      Apply the text colour as RGB components.
      Marquee Marquee.colour​(Color colour)
      Apply the text colour.
      Marquee Marquee.disable()
      Disable the marquee.
      Marquee Marquee.enable()
      Enable the marquee.
      Marquee Marquee.enable​(boolean enable)
      Apply the initial enabled/disabled state.
      Marquee Marquee.location​(int x, int y)
      Apply the text location in video co-ordinates.
      static Marquee Marquee.marquee()
      Create a marquee.
      Marquee Marquee.opacity​(float opacity)
      Apply the text opacity.
      Marquee Marquee.opacity​(int opacity)
      Apply the text opacity.

      Apply the text position.

      Set the time before the marquee text will refresh.
